tutorial.title: Docker Installation Tutorial (Terminal)
tutorial.description: Step-by-step guide to install Docker and Docker Compose on your system using terminal commands.

steps.title: Update Package Repository
steps.description: Before installing Docker and Docker Compose, update the package repository to ensure you have the latest information.
instructions: Open your command line interface (CLI) in a virtual machine or Linux.

steps.title: Install Docker Dependencies
steps.description: Install the necessary dependencies required for Docker installation.
instructions: Run the appropriate command for your Linux distribution to install dependencies:
- For Debian/Ubuntu: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl software-properties-common
- For CentOS: sudo yum install -y yum-utils device-mapper-persistent-data lvm2

steps.title: Install Docker Engine
steps.description: Install Docker Engine (Community Edition) on your system.
instructions: sudo apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io
